title: Closed game because lost connection, no reconnect screen
body:
I unfortunately don't have proof, but I was just in a game as Voli around 15 minutes in when I lost connection, which was strange, because that happens to me super rarely. I pulled up an internet browser and it's connection was fine, so I exited League to try to reconnect back in. Immediately as I closed the league game to took me back to the home client like I had never been playing. I closed and reopened the client and still no reconnect screen. 

Has anyone else had this problem? Am I going to get counted for a loss?

replies.body: Ahhhh it sounds like you encountered a rare issue where the game actually crashes on the server itself. It's pretty rare, but when it happens you won't ever be able to reconnect and it'll look like the match just never happened at all. No worries, you won't get any penalties for that match either.
